episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a range of fascinating topics including scientists creating lava, the etymology of Timbuktu, the synchronization of lovers' heartbeats, and the sale of the Playboy Mansion with Hugh Hefner included.

facts.fact: A group of scientists is currently making their own lava.
The word Timbuktu means woman with a sticky out belly button.
This year, Hugh Hefner sold the Playboy Mansion; it comes with 30 rooms, a pool, a tennis court, a zoo license, and Hugh Hefner.
